title: keep getting removed from queues with no disconnect on my end

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I have now been removed from ranked queues for times now with no disconnect whatsoever. I can still see people typing, and I can switch champions until 0 and then it kicks me out of the queue and gives me the message in the picture. What the hell is going on?????

replies.body:
Galacius with the assist! 

It seems to me that some of your game files might have been corrupted somehow, and now the client isn't able to recognize your champions picks. Let's try running a repair through the client options to see if that fixes things up first.

https://i.gyazo.com/2374b5a648c0ce1d75e161486bedf757.png

A lot of people i know use Wooxy the custom skin installer (which claims to be in line with rito ToS pls dont ban my friends im no snitch). could that cause data corruption and result in a similiar issue to this?

Hello Galaxy,

Have you tried running the Hextech Repair Tool located here --> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs ? If you haven't give that a try and see if you can gather log files at the end of the process. If the tool doesn't fix the problem submit a ticket to support with the r3d log files and see if they can help you!

Thank You for the help, I ran the hextech repair tool, tomorrow ill play a few games and see if there is still an issue. Ill post here with an update.
Thanks again.
